name: Winter strikes back!
description:
Project for Ludum Dare 50

Theme: Delay the inevitable

It’s time for Winter to go, but she’s got a secret plan! Join forces with Winter to help her stay longer! Enjoy a platformer-based game, featuring an unexpected main character!

CONTROLS:

JUMP - HOLD SPACE;

MOVEMENT - [A] [D];

AIM and SHOOT by Mouse.

AUTHORS:

Biba-Sama - Game Design

Demorok - Code

Olguinne - Art

Elena-S - Animations

truebach - Sound and Music
